title: freedom scientific - open Book V7 (full with serial)
description: open book is a program designed to work with various types of scanners, relying this output to speech and its formatting is suitable for a screen reader or magnifier. The user is able to convert and export various types of formats and documents that a screen reader would not be able to process thanks to the comercially built-in OCR engines. The prize of this thing is ridiculously high just like their other products. You can of course scan images and keep the exact view of a scanned work. OpenBook comes with more features which you can find on its documentation. Use the serial on the .txt file to activate.
